file_content.text: Once you're in, sack the board of directors and disable the ion cannons. When the rocket trams are back online, we ramp up our invasion.
Finally. Once CEC falls, the rocket trams can spread our forces across Corellia. Then this planet will be ours.
We must move quickly. Czerka's hull-cracker is already in the field. Are you ready to shove it down CEC's throat?
CEC ensured its downfall the second they defied the Empire. I'll see them punished.
It is time.
CEC will choke on Czerka's gift. Then I'll cripple their ion cannons.
I can't wait.
Their board of directors doesn't know what they're up against. Show them no mercy.
I'll make the explosive delivery. Then it's only a matter of disabling their ion cannons.
In a manner of speaking, yes.
The consummate professional, just like Darth Decimus said.
When the explosion shakes your ship, get my payment ready.
I'm good to go.
Financial arrangements are underway. We pay when the CEC ion cannons are silent.
Double my fee, or you can hit CEC yourself.
This is where I up my price.
Fortune over the Empire? Very well. Disable their ion cannons, and I'll meet your demands.
Always a mercenary, I see. Fine. I'll request emergency funds at once--payable on CEC's demise.
I've got a pazaak game later, then a lunch with the Emperor.... Lucky you, I'm free for now.
Let me check my schedule....
Good. I wouldn't want to disrupt your busy agenda.
Commander, have your explosives team prime the hull-cracker.
The CEC signal towers are down. The droids aren't getting coordinated orders.
Very good. With their security confused, we can take the hull-cracker right to CEC's doorstep.
Everything is in place, Darth Charnus.
